text:
MEMORANDUM
TO: All Subscribers, "U.N. News for Women Broadcasters”
It would be extremely helpful if you would inform us of any changes in
your name and address so that we may keep our mailing list in order.
If for any reason you no longer wish to continue receiving the
”U. N. News for Women Broadcasters", will you please advise us immediately.
Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.
The form below is for your convenience.
NOTIFICATION OF CHANGE FOR MAILING LIST - "U. N. News for Women Broadcasters”
Address:
United Nations, Room 1079
New York, New York
NAME._STATION
ADDRESS_
CITY._ STATE_
Comments:
FS
(In giving change of address, please be sure to give both your former as well as present one.)
24975-Oct. 1955-4500
